issue.title: [Python] NumPyBuffer destructor should hold the GIL
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2173](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2173). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Failure to hold the GIL can lead to crashes, depending on presence of several threads or whatever the object allocator needs to do.
